prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's thoughts and emotions when I sent him the link to Faun's Album Midgard playlist?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Due to the lack of planets placement in the 9th house, Stefan should be represented by the 9th house ruler of Jupiter.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a list of the key horary chart factors identified strictly according to horary principles for the query (“What were Stefan’s thoughts and emotions when I sent him the link to Faun’s Album Midgard playlist?”):

1. Significators and House Representations
 • Ascendant in Aries at 16°40′ represents you (Melissa Gale).
 • Stefan is indicated by the 9th house—the house of foreign or distant connections. With no planet occupying the 9th house, his significator is taken as its ruler, Jupiter, whose natural rulership of Sagittarius stands in.
 • Jupiter is positioned at 11°17′ in Gemini (occupying the area of the 2nd house as per the given house cusps).

2. Planetary Placements Relevant to the Query
 • Sun in Aquarius at 19°05′ (located in the 11th house), reflecting conscious ideas and self-expression.
 • Moon in Gemini at 18°34′ (in the 2nd house), representing thoughts and emotional currents; note its role in conveying mood and inner reactions.
 • Mercury in Aquarius at 17°40′ (in the 11th house), emphasizing communication and mental activity.
 • Venus in Aries at 2°20′ (located in the 12th house), suggesting underlying, perhaps hidden, affective tones.
 • Mars in Cancer at 18°45′ (retrograde, in the 4th house), introducing an emotional, instinctive drive and possible protective feelings.
 • Saturn in Pisces at 18°09′ (in the 12th house), indicating sense of responsibility, inhibition, or emotional burden influencing perceptions.
 • Uranus in Taurus at 23°17′ (in the 1st house), providing sudden insights or surprises in your personal attitude.
 • Neptune in Pisces at 28°09′ (in the 12th house), infusing a dreamy or elusive quality to undercurrents; it is closely tied to Venus and the North Node.
 • Pluto in Aquarius at 2°15′ (in the 11th house), representing transformation and deep psychological influence.
 • North Node in Pisces at 29°30′ (retrograde, in the 12th house) factors into destiny or fate regarding hidden issues.
 • Chiron in Aries at 19°42′ (in the 1st house), highlighting wounds or healing that might be triggered in relation to the query.

3. Major Aspects of Importance
 • Jupiter Sextile Ascendant (orb 5°): This aspect connects Stefan’s ruler (Jupiter) with your personal significator, suggesting an interactive link between his state and your prompt.
 • Moon square Saturn (orb 0°): A very tight aspect that may indicate tension between emotional expression and inhibiting or burdensome factors.
 • Moon Sextile Mercury (orb 1°) and Moon Trine Mercury (orb 1°): These aspects support clear, communicative thought processes underlying the emotional response.
 • Mercury Sextile Ascendant (orb 1°) and Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb 2°): Reinforcing communication mixed with sensitivity and vulnerability.
 • Mars Square Ascendant (orb 2°) and Mars Square Chiron (orb 1°): Indicating internal conflict between instinctive drives and wounded or healing areas, possibly affecting how ideas are processed emotionally.
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 0°): Represents a subtle depth in affect or desire that may underlie the overall energetic tone.
 • Other planetary contacts (such as Sun Sextile Ascendant and Sun Sextile Chiron) add further layers suggesting that the interplay of rational insight and emotional vulnerability is active at this moment.
 • A T-Square is present linking the MC (in Capricorn at 8°34′), Venus (in Aries at 2°20′), and the IC (in Cancer at 8°34′). This dynamic configuration may reflect inner tensions between public image, private emotional states, and underlying factors associated with communication or foreign influences.

4. Patterns and Special Features in the Chart
 • The chart forms a Bowl shape, with the sextile being the most common aspect (twelve occurrences overall), underscoring a network of opportunities for harmonious exchanges.
 • The dominance of Air among the inner planets (evident in the placements of Sun, Moon, and Mercury) emphasizes mental processing and communicative expression.
 • The Cardinal modality is strong among the inner planets, showing initiative and a drive to act on impressionistic or intuitive insights.
 • The Moon (a primary indicator of emotions) is waxing gibbous, suggesting a state in process—emotions are developing but not yet fully culminated.
 • With Jupiter (Stefan’s ruler) in Gemini, its aspects (sextile to the Ascendant and trine to Mercury) are crucial in understanding how his thoughts and feelings are being intellectually processed, yet its placement in a house that concerns material values may complicate pure emotional resonance.

These are the detailed chart factors and configurations that will form the basis for the subsequent interpretation of Stefan’s mental and emotional state in response to your query.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based strictly on the chart data, here is the interpretation regarding Stefan’s thoughts and emotions when you sent him the link to Faun’s Album Midgard playlist.

• Stefan’s representation is drawn from Jupiter—the ruler of his 9th house—located in Gemini. This placement indicates that his mind is active, inquisitive, and quick to jump between ideas. He processes the musical invitation with a natural intellectual liveliness. The mental response is keen, and he appears inclined to dissect the content for its nuances.

• The beneficial Jupiter sextile your Ascendant signals that his intellectual engagement resonates in a way that positively intersects with your significations. There is an interactive spark: his thoughts, while stimulated, are also in dialogue with the energy you embody.

• The Moon, which governs his underlying emotional state, is situated in Gemini and forms a square to Saturn. This sharp aspect suggests an emotional tension—while there is interest and curiosity, a quality of caution, reservation, or even self-imposed inhibition tempers his reaction. There is the suggestion of an internal conflict: a desire to fully immerse in the album's allure countered by an undercurrent of reserved sensitivity, perhaps predicated on external expectations or a personal standard he feels compelled to meet.

• Communication is further highlighted through Mercury in Aquarius (in your 11th house), which strengthens the mental acuity in the interaction. His response is filtered through both clarity of thought and an inventive, sometimes unconventional perspective. The Mercury sextiles present (to both your Ascendant and to Chiron) enhance a sense that his mental commentary might also touch on personal vulnerabilities or old, unhealed sensitivities triggered by the encounter.

• A subtle interplay emerges with Mars in Cancer, residing in the 4th house and aspecting both your Ascendant and Chiron. This suggests an instinctive, almost primal reaction beneath the surface, where suppressed sentiments or the need for self-protection come into play. His immediate inner reaction may harbor a slight defensive edge, likely resulting from a conflict between his instinctive drives and a wish to remain composed.

• The T-square configuration involving the MC (in Capricorn), Venus (in Aries), and the IC (in Cancer) introduces additional challenges. This dynamic hints at a tension between public projection and private emotional states. While the public display (linked to the album’s energy or its cultural appeal) might seduce him intellectually, his inner world holds reservations influenced by past emotional experiences or a sense of responsibility. Venus in Aries—the placement of foundational affective impulses—is positioned in a house that suggests these emotional currents are somewhat hidden. They add a layer of intense yet quickly shifting passion that may be difficult for him to fully align with his more analytical mindset.

• Neptune and Saturn in Pisces in the 12th house add a shimmering ambiguity to his response. Their placement speaks to subtle, almost subconscious processes at work. There could be an undercurrent of yearning or a connection to the mystical or unformed aspects of the musical work. Yet, Saturn’s restraining presence ensures that this yearning does not erupt unchecked. Instead, he experiences it as something eerie or elusive—a blend of fascination and uneasy distance that he may not immediately reveal.

• The overall airiness—marked by dominant placements in Aquarius and Gemini—underscores that his processing of the link is primarily mental rather than overtly emotional. There is a robust intellectual engagement, but the Moon’s tense relation with Saturn places a guard around his true feelings. The interplay between mental stimulation and emotional reservation suggests that Stefan experiences the album as an evocative puzzle; his mind is alight with curiosity and even enthusiasm, yet his heart hesitates, enveloped in an almost self-imposed reserve.

Based on these factors, it appears Stefan’s reaction to the link was multifaceted. His mind is abuzz with inquisitiveness and a lively engagement with the musical piece. At the same time, his deeper emotional layers receive the message with a note of caution and defensiveness. This blend of intellectual excitement with a measured, reserved affect indicates that while Stefan finds the album compelling, he remains guarded—suggesting that the trigger may have touched on personal areas of vulnerability or past internal conflicts.
